ACTIVITIES
*Content Drive
  • Ask course organizers to post an invite to the content drive
  • In particular, ask learners to share their experiences on the blog to give them some status and recognition
  • Blogging for P2PU gets you the superblogger badge?
*Ask everyone to create content goals (frame it by asking them what they want their content to do)
  • Be featured on HackerNews? / increase signups / badge drive etc

*Content Party
  • Secret Santa content party--someone gives you a constraint that you need to write about?
    • You draw a person's name, they give you a constraint

Other content bits
  • Create a content calendar and share with P2PU team / integrate School of Open calendar
  • Pull search terms from our analytics and think about blog stories around them
  • Create our own content marketing course on p2pu.org?
  • School of Data--ask them to have a marketing pow-wow on Jan 15
